Nightshift continues to play the scared kitty act as the spider now sits on=
 his nose. 

" Wolfgang, this thing is creep'n me out.  And how the pit did=
 it get in here?

He finally shakes it off his nose, backs up and sniffs ar=
ound.

What if there's more of those spiders in here?  We gotta check this =
place out for stowaways."

Sent from my iPhone

On Sep 4, 2012, at 12:31 PM=
, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> As BLACKARACHNIA press=
ed foward she could see the entrance to the ARK.
> It appeared to wide open=
. The two guards: NIGHTSHIFT and WOLFGANG
> appeared to be, at least tempor=
arily, distracted with something else.
> 
> There were other MAXIMALS as we=
ll, but most of them seemed to be
> packing another ship or were generally =
going about the business of
> trying to make repairs or modifications to th=
e ARK.
> 
> As BLACKARACHNIA stepped across the threshold, she might even b=
e able
> to 'feel' the sensor net close about her. At the moment though, he=
r
> cloak was holding it at bay. It wouldn't do it for ever, but it was
> s=
till holding. A single mistep would be a dangerous one though.
> 
> Inside =
was the main hall of the ARK. Behind her was the way out, ahead
> of her wa=
s the direction of the command center. Between her and that
> stood another=
 problem.
> 
> It was here that the loading of the second ship was being do=
ne. LEO
> PRIME as well as NOCTORRO were moving things back and forth and
>=
 directing others as well.
> 
> It would not be easy to get passed them, es=
pecially if NIGHTSHIFT and
> WOLFGANG started nosing about more.
>

    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>As BLACKARACHNIA pressed=
 foward she could see the entrance to the ARK.<br>
It appeared to wide open=
. The two guards: NIGHTSHIFT and WOLFGANG<br>
appeared to be, at least temp=
orarily, distracted with something else.<br>
<br>
There were other MAXIMALS=
 as well, but most of them seemed to be<br>
packing another ship or were ge=
nerally going about the business of<br>
trying to make repairs or modificat=
ions to the ARK.<br>
<br>
As BLACKARACHNIA stepped across the threshold, sh=
e might even be able<br>
to 'feel' the sensor net close about her. At the m=
oment though, her<br>
cloak was holding it at bay. It wouldn't do it for ev=
er, but it was<br>
still holding. A single mistep would be a dangerous one =
though.<br>
<br>
Inside was the main hall of the ARK. Behind her was the wa=
y out, ahead<br>
of her was the direction of the command center. Between he=
r and that<br>
stood another problem.<br>
<br>
It was here that the loading=
 of the second ship was being done. LEO<br>
PRIME as well as NOCTORRO were =
moving things back and forth and<br>
directing others as well.<br>
<br>
It =
would not be easy to get passed them, especially if NIGHTSHIFT and<br>
WOLF=
GANG started nosing about more.<br>
<br>
(OOC: Feel free to bounce off each=
 other if you like)<br>
<br>
(TAG)<br>
<br>
- Preston<br>
</p>
